title: Empire Service Weekend Eastbound
heading: Amtrak's Empire Service: Weekend Eastbound & Southbound
programmers_note: 68 is listed as daily but amtrak.com will only book it on Sunday; 252 is listed on Saturday but not on Amtrak.com
bottom_text:
The Maple Leaf is operated jointly by Amtrak and VIA Rail Canada; VIA Rail has different train numbers for the same train.
Appropriate documentation (passports, visas, vaccination cards, etc.) is required to cross the US-Canadian border; please check government websites for details.

Local connecting trains are provided at Poughkeepsie, Croton-Harmon, Yonkers, and New York by the MTA.

The Adirondack Railroad runs seasonal scenic trips from Utica into the Adirondacks.
